S. 456

A BILL
To require the Secretary of Commerce to conduct a study on the
impact of artificial intelligence on small businesses.

Be it enacted by the Senate and House of Representatives of the
United States of America in Congress assembled,

SECTION 1. STUDY ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE IMPACT.

    (a) IN GENERAL.--Not later than 1 year after the date of
enactment of this Act, the Secretary of Commerce shall conduct a
study on the impact of artificial intelligence technologies on
small businesses in the United States.
    (b) REPORT.--Not later than 18 months after the date of
enactment of this Act, the Secretary shall submit to Congress a
report containing the results of the study conducted under
subsection (a).
